column2: "...I think I get the picture. We really have ended up in a completely different world."
"Well, no sense panicking. We'll just have to figure out how to get home one step at a time."
"We were investigating the Forest on Ragol when we were brought here, so we still have some data on forest plants and enemies with us."
"If we investigate this world's forest and take readings on the soil, the atmosphere, the plant life and so on, maybe the differences will show us something useful."
"Please! Take Kireek and I with you to investigate the Forest!"
